comments: 'J.M.Costa' in Itinera Geobot., 15(2): 697 (2002) is an error for 'M.J.Costa' according to Rivas. Mart.
examples: Ranunculus seguieri subsp. cantabricus Rivas Mart., Izco & M.J.Costa in Trab. Dep. Bot. Fisiol. Veg. Univ. Madrid 3: 84 (1971).
source: IK. Index Herbariorum, ed. 8. B.Valdes 2 January 1991.
